AFz.caption: Table source
AFz.doc: The source table containing route data
AFz.name: table_source

AGB.caption: Latitude field
AGB.doc: The field name in the table source that contains latitude values.
AGB.name: latitude_field

AGC.caption: Longitude field
AGC.doc: The field name in the table source that contains longitude values.
AGC.name: longitude_field

AGD.caption: Color field
AGD.doc: The field name for the route color. If not provided, defaults to "#000000" (black).
AGD.name: color_field

AGE.caption: Name field
AGE.doc: The field name for the route name. If not provided, routes will be named "Route_[timestamp]".
AGE.name: name_field

AGF.caption: Distance limit field
AGF.doc: The field name for the route distance limit. If not provided, defaults to Infinity.
AGF.name: distance_limit_field

AGG.caption: Show all routes
AGG.doc: If true, all routes will be displayed on the map. Defaults to true.
AGG.name: show_all_routes

AGZ.caption: Route restriction field
AGZ.doc: The field name containing route restrictions. Each restriction should be in the format "key:value".
AGZ.name: route_restriction_field

AGf.caption: Base color field
AGf.doc: The field name for the route base color. If not provided, defaults to "#808080" (gray).
AGf.name: base_color_field
